name: Legendary Lord of Dragons (Boss Avatar Card)
text:
Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can Normal Summon/Set or Special Summon this card from your Extra Zone. 
This card can only be Summoned once per turn. 
While this card is face-up on the field: 
? This card's name is also treated as "Lord of D." 
? Dragon monsters you control cannot be targeted by your opponent's card effects. 
If this card would return to your hand or Deck, return it to your Extra Zone instead. 
During your End Phase: Return this card from anywhere to your Extra Zone. (even if this card is face-down.) 

Concept by MauGamesLOL
